short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for tracking productive work time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wondered "How much of the time I spend on internet is actually useful?". If yes, then this is your solution. SurfSense allows you to mark webpages or even entire domain as productive and then tracks time you spent. This allows you to get an accurate view of how you are spending time on the internet.
